entry.def: Popcorn is a snack which consists of grains of maize or corn that have been heated until they have burst and become large and light. It can be eaten with salt or sometimes sugar.

means.word_mean: 1. corn having small ears and kernels that burst when exposed to dry heat
2. small kernels of corn exploded by heat
